title.rendered: Villa Evora: Your Private & Luxurious Beach-side Getaway!

content.rendered:
Everything You Need to Know About Villa Evora

 

Out of the top villas in Goa with a private pool, Villa Evora is one of the most gorgeous ones. Villa Evora is a 4-bedroom abode that accommodates up to 10 guests. It resides in the little North Goan village, Assagaon. This villa is the perfect combination of modern and vintage interiors in the most peculiar ways.

The classy furniture and shades of the villa scream lavishness and luxury. The dark hues of black, grey, and brown bring a classic vibe to the table. They shine royally under yellow and golden lights reflecting the classiness of this villa.  The lush green garden at the entrance of the villa is more like the biblical Garden of Eden. It presents to give you a piece of heaven with every second you spend at the villa. 

The insides of the villa have cozy bedrooms, attached bathrooms, and a large living room that is meant to fit everyone effortlessly. Each bedroom includes a comfortable bed, a wardrobe, a tiny couch, and massive windows. A fresh breeze comes rushing in as you push the windows open. All the bathrooms feature vintage English mirrors and essential toiletries for the guests. The swimming pool with a cozy pool area makes this property one of the best villas in Goa with a private pool. 

Things to do in the villa:

 

Villa Evora is one of the best luxury villas in Goa. Several common spaces are available inside the villa so you can have a good time with your loved ones. You can also chill and relax alone in one of the private spaces and feel the peace it ropes in. The garden in front of the property is perfect for a little bonding time.

You can set up a bonfire at night as you party with your friends. There is a music player for your party needs too. You can crank up the music player and dance to your heart’s content. When it gets late and dusky, you can share horror stories with your gang! The poolside is perfect for your evening.

The caretakers can set up a barbeque for you at this place. You can dip your feet in the pool as you munch on your favorite food. On the lawn, you can set up events. This villa is perfect for all your party and luxury needs.

Things to do outside the villa:

 

You get to witness the Goan beauty with a minimal commute. Villa Evora is one of the top luxury villas in Goa and is close to several local attractions. This includes beaches and clubs and so much more. Vagator Beach is only 5 minutes away from the villa. Other nearby beaches include Anjuna Beach, Baga Beach, Candolim Beach, Morjim Beach, and Ashwem Beach.

If you are someone who craves fantastic Goan delicacies and luxurious fine dining? Several lavish restaurants are near the Villa Evora. Cohiba, Olives, Thalassa, Ciao Bella, Antares, and Gun Powder are a few local favorites that you can explore. Forts and museums of Goa are often overlooked due to the marvelous beaches and nightlife of the place. But they are picturesque, lovely, and worth your time.

House Rules:

 

  • A complimentary breakfast is served every morning to all the guests.
  • You can also hire a professional chef at an extra charge to do the work for you.
  • Loud music is not allowed to be played after 10 p.m.
  • We restrict the guests from smoking inside the villa and request them to proceed with it outside, for example, near the poolside area.
  • If you are bringing your pet(s) to the villa, there is a cleaning charge of Rs. 15,000. You need to pay it upfront. 

Cancellation & Refunds:

 

We will certainly regret having to see you cancel your booking at one of our luxury villas in Goa. But what we would regret more is if our interaction ended on a bad note. So, to avoid confusion and disputes, please read the cancellation and refund policy beforehand. Also, go through all the terms, conditions, rules, and regulations.

 

About Ukiyo Stays:

 

Have you been planning a trip to Goa for a while? But finding a suitable place to stay is a bigger task than you thought. Well, we are here to help! Ukiyo Stays is a platform that provides a huge collection of luxury villas in Goa for you to choose from.  We provide an effortless booking process, unmatched hospitality, and great deals. We also ensure that your stay at one of our villas in Goa with a private pool is extremely safe and homely. To book your next comfortable stay, drop in a message today!
